Class PacketUtilities

  • java.lang.Object

extends java.lang.Object

      Constructs a packet from a byte array and a packet ID.

    • Method Detail

      • constructPacket

        public static java.nio.ByteBuffer constructPacket(byte[] data,
                                                  int packetID)
        Constructs a packet from a byte array and a packet ID.
        Parameters:
        data - The byte data to put inside the packet
        packetID - The packet header identifier
        Returns:
        Returns a ByteBuffer containing the packet header identifier and the data

      • objectToBytes

        public static byte[] objectToBytes(java.lang.Object o)
        Converts an object to bytes
        Objects passed must be serializable
        Parameters:
        o - Object to convert to bytes
        Returns:
        Returns a byte array representing the object

      • packetToObject

        public static java.lang.Object packetToObject(java.nio.ByteBuffer packet)
        Takes a ByteBuffer packet as argument and converts it to an Object.
        Packets must have been generated by the constructPacket()-method
        Parameters:
        packet - The ByteBuffer packet to convert into an object
        Returns:
        Returns the object from the packet
